resources.string: Energetic and curiosity-driven junior level Android developer with 2 years\' experience learning and working with android development. Eager to be part of a group/company to provide support to deliver world class products and incredible user experience.

- 	Build an android app for any given design irrespective of complexity. 

- 	Seamlessly link android apps to any given backend APIs. 

- 	Adept in the google playstore app submission process. 

- 	Good follower. Capable leader myself if ever required. 

- 	Fast learner. 

- 	Admirer of all things beautiful.
